info.title: Artifacts API
info.description:
Artifacts is an API-based MMO game where you can manage 5 characters to explore, fight, gather resources, craft items and much more.

Website: https://artifactsmmo.com/

Documentation: https://docs.artifactsmmo.com/

OpenAPI Spec: https://api.artifactsmmo.com/openapi.json

post.description: Moves a character on the map using the map's X and Y position.

486.description: Character is locked. Action is already in progress.

post.description: Equip an item on your character.

200.description: The item has been successfully equipped on your character.

486.description: Character is locked. Action is already in progress.

478.description: Missing item or insufficient quantity in your inventory.

post.description: Unequip an item on your character.

200.description: The item has been successfully unequipped and added in his inventory.

486.description: Character is locked. Action is already in progress.

post.description: Start a fight against a monster on the character's map.

598.description: Monster not found on this map.

486.description: Character is locked. Action is already in progress.

post.description: Harvest a resource on the character's map.

200.description: The resource has been successfully gathered.

598.description: Resource not found on this map.

486.description: Character is locked. Action is already in progress.

post.description: Crafting an item. The character must be on a map with a workshop.

598.description: Workshop not found on this map.

486.description: Character is locked. Action is already in progress.

478.description: Missing item or insufficient quantity in your inventory.

post.description: Deposit an item in a bank on the character's map.

200.description: Item successfully deposited in your bank.

598.description: Bank not found on this map.

486.description: Character is locked. Action is already in progress.

478.description: Missing item or insufficient quantity in your inventory.

post.description: Deposit golds in a bank on the character's map.

200.description: Golds successfully deposited in your bank.

598.description: Bank not found on this map.

486.description: Character is locked. Action is already in progress.

478.description: Missing item or insufficient quantity in your inventory.

post.description: Recyling an item. The character must be on a map with a workshop (only for equipments and weapons).

598.description: Workshop not found on this map.

486.description: Character is locked. Action is already in progress.

478.description: Missing item or insufficient quantity in your inventory.

post.description: Take an item from your bank and put it in the character's inventory.

200.description: Item successfully withdraw from your bank.

486.description: Character is locked. Action is already in progress.

598.description: Bank not found on this map.

478.description: Missing item or insufficient quantity in your inventory.

post.description: Withdraw gold from your bank.

200.description: Golds successfully withdraw from your bank.

486.description: Character is locked. Action is already in progress.

598.description: Bank not found on this map.

post.description: Buy an item at the Grand Exchange on the character's map.

200.description: Item successfully buy from the Grand Exchange.

598.description: Grand Exchange not found on this map.

486.description: Character is locked. Action is already in progress.

post.description: Sell an item at the Grand Exchange on the character's map.

200.description: Item successfully sell at the Grand Exchange.

486.description: Character is locked. Action is already in progress.

478.description: Missing item or insufficient quantity in your inventory.

598.description: Grand Exchange not found on this map.

post.description: Accepting a new task.

486.description: Character is locked. Action is already in progress.

598.description: Tasks Master not found on this map.

post.description: Complete a task.

200.description: The task has been successfully completed.

486.description: Character is locked. Action is already in progress.

598.description: Tasks Master not found on this map.

488.description: Character has not completed the task.

post.description: Exchange 3 tasks coins for a random reward. Rewards are exclusive resources for crafting  items.

200.description: The tasks coins have been successfully exchanged.

486.description: Character is locked. Action is already in progress.

598.description: Tasks Master not found on this map.

478.description: Missing item or insufficient quantity in your inventory.

post.description: Delete an item from your character's inventory.

200.description: Item successfully deleted from your character.

486.description: Character is locked. Action is already in progress.

478.description: Missing item or insufficient quantity in your inventory.

get.description: History of the last 100 actions of all your characters.
Fetch all items in your bank.

parameters.name: item_code

schema.title: Item code
schema.description: Item to search in your bank.

parameters.description: Item to search in your bank.

post.description: Change your account password. Changing the password reset the account token.
Create new character on your account. You can create up to 5 characters.

495.description: Maximum characters reached on your account.

post.description: Delete character on your account.

parameters.name: sort

schema.title: Sort
schema.description: Default sort by combat total XP.

parameters.description: Default sort by combat total XP.

get.description: Retrieve the details of a character.

schema.description: Type of content on the map.

schema.title: Position X
schema.description: The position x of the map.

schema.title: Position Y
schema.description: The position X of the map.

parameters.description: The position X of the map.

parameters.name: craft_material

schema.description: Item code of items used as material for crafting.

get.description: Retrieve the details of a item.
Retrieve the details of a monster.
Retrieve the details of a resource.
Retrieve the details of a Grand Exchange item.

post.description: Create an account.
Use your account as HTTPBasic Auth to generate your token to use the API. You can also generate your token directly on the website.

get.description: Return the status of the game server.

name.title: Name
name.description: Your desired character name. It's unique and all players can see it.

fire.title: Fire
fire.description: The amount of fire hits blocked.

earth.title: Earth
earth.description: The amount of earth hits blocked.

water.title: Water
water.description: The amount of water hits blocked.

air.title: Air
air.description: The amount of air hits blocked.

total.title: Total
total.description: The amount of total hits blocked.

xp.title: Xp
xp.description: The current xp level of the combat level.

max_xp.title: Max Xp
max_xp.description: XP required to level up the character.

gold.title: Gold
gold.description: The numbers of golds on this character.

speed.title: Speed
speed.description: *Not available, on the roadmap. Character movement speed.

mining_xp.title: Mining Xp
mining_xp.description: The current xp level of the Mining skill.

mining_max_xp.title: Mining Max Xp
mining_max_xp.description: Mining XP required to level up the skill.

woodcutting_xp.title: Woodcutting Xp
woodcutting_xp.description: The current xp level of the Woodcutting skill.

woodcutting_max_xp.title: Woodcutting Max Xp
woodcutting_max_xp.description: Woodcutting XP required to level up the skill.

fishing_xp.title: Fishing Xp
fishing_xp.description: The current xp level of the Fishing skill.

fishing_max_xp.title: Fishing Max Xp
fishing_max_xp.description: Fishing XP required to level up the skill.

weaponcrafting_xp.title: Weaponcrafting Xp
weaponcrafting_xp.description: The current xp level of the Weaponcrafting skill.

weaponcrafting_max_xp.title: Weaponcrafting Max Xp
weaponcrafting_max_xp.description: Weaponcrafting XP required to level up the skill.

gearcrafting_xp.title: Gearcrafting Xp
gearcrafting_xp.description: The current xp level of the Gearcrafting skill.

gearcrafting_max_xp.title: Gearcrafting Max Xp
gearcrafting_max_xp.description: Gearcrafting XP required to level up the skill.

jewelrycrafting_xp.title: Jewelrycrafting Xp
jewelrycrafting_xp.description: The current xp level of the Jewelrycrafting skill.

jewelrycrafting_max_xp.title: Jewelrycrafting Max Xp
jewelrycrafting_max_xp.description: Jewelrycrafting XP required to level up the skill.

cooking_level.title: Cooking Level
cooking_level.description: The current xp level of the Cooking skill.

cooking_max_xp.title: Cooking Max Xp
cooking_max_xp.description: Cooking XP required to level up the skill.

haste.title: Haste
haste.description: *Character Haste. Increase speed attack (reduce fight cooldown)

critical_strike.title: Critical Strike
critical_strike.description: *Not available, on the roadmap. Character Critical   Strike. Critical strikes increase the attack's damage.

stamina.title: Stamina
stamina.description: *Not available, on the roadmap. Regenerates life at the start of each turn.

total_seconds.title: Total Seconds
total_seconds.description: The total seconds of the cooldown.

remaining_seconds.title: Remaining Seconds
remaining_seconds.description: The remaining seconds of the cooldown.

skill.title: Skill code
skill.description: Skill required to craft the item.

level.title: Level
level.description: The skill level required to craft the item.

items.title: Items
items.description: List of items required to craft the item.

x.title: X
x.description: The x coordinate of the destination.

y.title: Y
y.description: The y coordinate of the destination.

xp.title: Xp
xp.description: The amount of xp gained by the fight.

gold.title: Gold
gold.description: The amount of gold gained by the fight.

drops.title: Drops
drops.description: The items dropped by the fight.

turns.title: Turns
turns.description: Numbers of the turns of the combat.

monster_blocked_hits.description: The amount of blocked hits by the monster.

player_blocked_hits.description: The amount of blocked hits by the player.

price.title: Price
price.description: Item price. Item price validation protects you if the price has changed since you last checked the buy/sale price of an item.

code.title: Code
code.description: Item code. This is the item's unique identifier (ID).

effects.title: Effects
effects.description: List of object effects. For equipment, it will include item stats.

code.title: Code
code.description: The code of the monster. This is the monster's unique identifier (ID).

drops.title: Drops
drops.description: Monster drops. This is a list of items that the monster drops after killing the monster.

code.title: Code
code.description: The code of the resource. This is the resource's unique identifier (ID).

skill.title: Skill code
skill.description: The skill required to gather this resource.

level.title: Level
level.description: The skill level required to gather this resource.

total.title: Total
total.description: The total required to complete the task.
